response: "{ \"title\": \"Easy: Array Median\", \"description\": \"Write a function `array_median` that takes an array of integers as input and returns the median value of the array. The median is the middle value when the array is sorted in ascending order.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef array_median(arr: list[int]) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list[int]): A list of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the median value of the input array as an integer.\", \"code\": \"import statistics\\n\\ndef array_median(arr: list[int]) -> int:\\n    return statistics.median(arr)\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert array_median([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]) == 3\", \"assert array_median([-1, -2, 0, 1, 2]) == 0\", \"assert array_median([]) == None\"] }"
